plot: Attack of the aliens, is a story of the Hav'ni race coming to take over and destroy the planet Earth and their imminent defeat of the Human race told from their point of view.
title: Attack of the Aliens
plot_es: Attack of the aliens, is a story of the Hav'ni race coming to take over and destroy the planet Earth and their imminent defeat of the Human race told from their point of view.
plot_en: Attack of the aliens, is a story of the Hav'ni race coming to take over and destroy the planet Earth and their imminent defeat of the Human race told from their point of view.
